title: Do you want to find out how much your colleagues earn?
description: Driven by demand from their staff a growing number of companies are introducing transparency on pay.

title: Ukrainians flock to get patriotic tattoos
description: People headed to the front line, and their supporters, are having the country's war with Russia memorialise.

title: UK elections 2022: Voters discuss key election issues
description: Voters in Southampton discuss their key issues ahead of the local elections.

title: Cost of living: Owners 'giving up pets' as prices rise
description: Animal sanctuary staff in Sheffield say more pets than ever are being given up as prices increase.

title: Elena Krawzow: The Paralympian who posed for Playboy magazine
description: When Elena Krawzow posed topless for Playboy magazine she became the first Para-athlete to do so. Her decision did not please everyone.

title: Liverpool have chance to become 'immortal' after Villarreal win
description: Liverpool move to within eight games of "immortality" with their Champions League win over Villarreal, so can they do it?

title: 'No-fault' evictions: Renters say stress is making them ill
description: A poll suggests 227,000 renters in England have faced 'no fault' eviction notices in recent years.

title: 'The thought of running out of HRT is terrifying'
description: A shortage of some hormone-replacement therapy has left some women struggling with menopause symptoms.

title: Covid: Discharging hospital patients to care homes 'unlawful'
description: The High Court says government policies did not take into account transmission risks to the elderly.

title: Shelter says 227,000 'no fault' evictions in three years is appalling
description: The homelessness charity wants ministers to scrap the process of tenancies ending with no explanation.

title: World Snooker Championship 2022: Six-time champion Ronnie O'Sullivan seals semi-final place
description: Six-time champion Ronnie O'Sullivan moves into the semi-finals of the World Championship with a comfortable 13-5 win over Stephen Maguire.

title: Tories investigate claims MP watched pornography in Commons chamber
description: Tory chief whip is "looking into" claims an MP watched porn on his phone next to a female colleague.

title: Bianca Williams search: Met Police officers to face gross-misconduct hearings
description: Five officers face gross-misconduct proceedings after the search of British sprinter Bianca Williams.

title: Tim Westwood: Claims against DJ are appalling, BBC director general says
description: An investigation uncovered allegations of predatory sexual behaviour and touching against the DJ.

title: Gazprom halts gas supply to Poland and Bulgaria as Russia accused of blackmail
description: Russian energy giant Gazprom cuts supply to Poland and Bulgaria for refusal to pay in roubles.

title: Vivianne Miedema: From the brink of retirement to WSL history
description: Vivianne Miedema tells MOTDx about coping with pressure, being the centre of attention and the importance of happiness on and off the pitch.

title: Transnistria and Ukraine conflict: Is war spreading?
description: Mysterious explosions in Transnistria raise fears that the Ukraine conflict may spread to Moldova.

title: What changes could Elon Musk make to Twitter?
description: After the billionaire struck a deal to buy the site, speculation has begun over what the future holds.

title: Ukraine: West should provide warplanes, says Liz Truss
description: Foreign Secretary Liz Truss will use a speech to urge Nato to answer calls for heavier armaments.

title: Angela Rayner: Brushing aside sexism doesn't make it OK
description: Labour's deputy says she hopes to hear from Boris Johnson as the Mail on Sunday defends its story.

title: Scottish government ordered to publish indyref2 legal advice
description: Ministers had refused to make it public, arguing that it would breach legal professional privilege.

title: Katie Price in court over 'restraint order breach'
description: The ex-model is accused of breaching a restraining order against ex-husband Kieran Hayler's fiancee.

title: Lottery winner who gave away half of £115m fortune 'addicted' to helping
description: Frances and Patrick Connolly landed a £115m jackpot and have donated more than half their winnings.

title: NBA play-offs: Ja Morant stars as Memphis Grizzlies beat Minnesota Timberwolves
description: Watch Memphis Grizzlies guard Ja Morant's stunning dunk in their 111-109 win against the Minnesota Timberwolves.

title: Rural areas held back by housing and infrastructure woes, report warns
description: There is a “chronic under-appreciation” of the potential of the countryside, says a new report.

title: Barney McDonald: 'Dad was taken from us, there's a piece missing'
description: The bereaved family of taxi driver Barney McDonald are pleading for new information 20 years after his murder.

title: Wunderkids: Building football’s most exciting young XI - week 11: Youssoufa Moukoko
description: BBC Sounds podcast 'Wunderkids' is building football's most exciting young XI - the focus of episode 11 is Borussia Dortmund striker Youssoufa Moukoko.

title: NI election 2022: UUP hopes fresh image will provide a polling boost
description: The party has adopted new approaches under Doug Beattie in a bid to win over voters.

title: Lockdown flat gardener to exhibit at Chelsea Flower Show
description: Jason Williams turned his balcony in Manchester into a "cloud garden" during the pandemic.

title: The Papers: Westwood allegations and 'Cabinet urges tax cuts'
description: Sexual misconduct claims against DJ Tim Westwood and calls for help to cut household costs lead the papers.

title: 'My ancestor was a Jarrow marcher - he'd be furious people are struggling'
description: First-time voter James Lamb is a descendant of one of 200 men who walked 300 miles for jobs.

title: Eurovision entrant Sam Ryder meets former winner
description: Conchita Wurst won the Eurovision Song Contest in 2014. How does she rate Sam Ryder's chances?
